title: Create FO-03 agent definition
description:
Create the FO-03 agent with Mastra.

Files to create:
- src/mastra/agents/fo-03/agent.ts
- src/mastra/agents/fo-03/index.ts

Agent should:
- Use same pattern as FO-02 agent
- Include DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS for affirmation generation
- Export createFO03Agent(implementation) function
- Support configurable system prompt from KV store

The agent instructions should guide the LLM to use the richer context from FO-03 onboarding:
- User name and familiarity level
- Selected topics
- Situation description (text + chips)
- Current feelings (text + chips)
- What helps them feel good (text + chips)

Reference src/mastra/agents/fo-02/agent.ts for the pattern.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; grep -l 'createFO03Agent' src/mastra/agents/fo-03/index.ts returns the file
closed_reason: Created FO-03 agent with expanded DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS covering user context (name, familiarity, topics, situation, feelings, whatHelps) and createFO03Agent factory function. Files: src/mastra/agents/fo-03/agent.ts and index.ts
